code: @Override public boolean matches(Exchange exchange) {     try {         Message message = exchange.getIn().getBody(Message.class).         ValidationContext context = validatorExpression != null ? validatorExpression.evaluate(exchange, ValidationContext.class) : dynamicValidationContext(message, exchange.getIn().getHeader(HL7Constants.HL7_CONTEXT, HapiContext.class)).         MessageValidator validator = new MessageValidator(context, false).         return validator.validate(message).     } catch (HL7Exception e) {         throw RuntimeCamelException.wrapRuntimeCamelException(e).     } }

private ValidationContext dynamicValidationContext(Message message, HapiContext hapiContext) {     return hapiContext != null ? hapiContext.getValidationContext() : message.getParser().getHapiContext().getValidationContext(). }
